default.description: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seeds on its back in order to grow.
The bulb on its back grows as it absorbs nutrients. The bulb gives off a pleasant aroma when it blooms.
As it warms itself and absorbs the sunlight, its flower petals release a pleasant fragrance.
If it's healthy, the flame on the tip of its tail will burn vigorously, even if it gets a bit wet.
If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
It uses its wings to fly high. The temperature of its fire increases as it gains experience in battle.
When it feels threatened, it draws its legs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.
Its long, furry tail is a symbol of longevity, making it quite popular among older people.
It firmly plants its feet on the ground before shooting water from the jets on its back.
It crawls into foliage where it camouflages itself among leaves that are the same color as its body.
This is its preevolved form. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
It flits from flower to flower, collecting nectar. It can even identify distant flowers in bloom.
The barb on top of its head secretes a strong poison. It uses this toxic barb to protect itself.
Nearly incapable of movement, it leans against stout trees while waiting for its evolution.
It uses sharp, poisonous stings to defeat prey, then takes the victim back to its nest for food.
It rapidly flaps its wings in the grass, stirring up a dust cloud that drives insect prey out into the open.
It slowly flies in a circular pattern, all the while keeping a sharp lookout for prey.
This #mon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.
This #mon's impressive vitality allows it to live anywhere. It also multiplies very quickly.

Alolan.description: It has no interest in anything that's not fresh. If you take it shopping with you, it'll help pick ingredients.

default.description: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.

Alolan.description: It makes its Rattata underlings gather its food, dining only on the most nutritious and delicious fare.

default.description: To protect its territory, it flies around ceaselessly, making highpitched cries.
It uses its long beak to attack. It has a surprisingly long reach, so it must be treated with caution.
It flutters the tip of its tongue to seek out the scent of prey, then swallows the prey whole.
To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.
When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.
If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.

Alolan.description: When you rub its cheeks, a sweet fragrance comes wafting out. However, you'll also get a light shock!

default.description: It prefers dry, sandy places because it uses the sand to protect itself when threatened.

Alolan.description: It lives on snowy mountains. Its steel shell is so hard, it can't roll its body up into a ball.

default.description: Adept at climbing trees, it rolls into a spiny ball, then attacks its enemies from above.

Alolan.description: Many people climb snowy mountains, hoping to see the icy spikes of this #mon glisten in the light of dawn.

default.description: Small and very docile, it protects itself with its small, poisonous horn when attacked.
It has a docile nature. If it is threatened with attack, it raises the barbs that are all over its body.
The hard scales that cover its strong body serve as excellent protection from any attack.
It constantly moves its large ears in many directions in order to detect danger right away.
It is easily agitated and uses its horn for offense as soon as it notices an attacker.
It uses its thick arms, legs and tail to attack forcefully. Melee combat is its specialty.
Though rarely seen, it becomes easier to spot, for some reason, on the night of a full moon.
Said to live in quiet, remote mountains, this type of fairy has a strong aversion to being seen.
As its body grows larger, its six warm tails become more beautiful, with a more luxurious coat of fur.

Alolan.description: If you observe its curly hairs through a microscope, you'll see small ice particles springing up.

default.description: It is said to live a thousand years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

Alolan.description: The reason it guides people all the way down its mountain's base is so that they hurry up and leave.

default.description: It rolls its cute eyes as it sings a soothing lullaby. Its gentle song puts anyone who hears it to sleep.
The rich, fluffy fur that covers its body feels so good that anyone who feels it can't stop touching it.
During the day, it gathers with others and hangs from the ceilings of old buildings and caves.
However hard its victim's hide may be, it punctures with sharp fangs and gorges itself with blood.
During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
The smell from its droollike syrup and the pollen on its petals is so bad, it may make opponents faint.
By shaking its big petals, it scatters toxic pollen into the air, turning the air yellow.
The tochukaso growing on this #mon's back orders it to extract juice from tree trunks.
When nothing's left to extract from the bug, the mushrooms on its back leave spores on the bug's egg.
The small bugs it eats appear only at night, so it sleeps in a hole in a tree until night falls.
The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who touches them, making that person unable to stand.
It digs underground and chews on tree roots, sticking its head out only when the sun isn't bright.

Alolan.description: The metalrich geology of this #mon's habitat caused it to develop steel whiskers on its head.

default.description: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.

Alolan.description: Its metallic whiskers are heavy, so it's not very fast, but it has the power to dig through bedrock.

default.description: It loves things that sparkle. When it sees a shiny object, the gold coin on its head shines too.

Alolan.description: Highly intelligent and prideful, it's famously difficult to handle. That's also a reason for its popularity.

Galarian.description: These daring #mon have coins on their foreheads. Harder coins garner more respect among Meowth.

default.description: Behind its lithe, elegant appearance lies a barbaric side. It will tear apart its prey on a mere whim.

Alolan.description: It has the classiest coat. The rippling of its fur in the heat of battle has a beauty all its own.

default.description: The only time it can use its psychic power is when its sleeping brain cells happen to wake.
It swims gracefully along on the quiet, slowmoving rivers and lakes of which it is so fond.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.
It will beat up anyone who makes it mad, even if it has to chase them until the end of the world.
It controls a big territory. If it detects an unknown smell, it roars loudly to force out the intruder.

Hisuian.description: They patrol their territory in pairs. Their fur has igneous rock components from volcanic activity.

default.description: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were attracted to its movement as it ran through prairies.

Hisuian.description: Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a chase as it dances past them.

default.description: The swirl on its belly is its insides showing through the skin. It looks clearer after it eats.
Though it is skilled at walking, it prefers to live underwater where there is less danger.
It can use its welldeveloped arms and legs to run on the surface of the water for a split second.
It hypnotizes itself so that it can teleport away when it senses danger, even if it is asleep.
When it closes its eyes, twice as many alpha particles come out of the surface of its body.
It has an IQ of 5000. It calculates many things in order to gain the edge in every battle.
It trains by lifting rocks in the mountains. It can even pick up a Graveler with ease.
This tough #mon always stays in the zone. Its muscles become thicker after every battle.
With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.
If it notices anything that moves, it immediately flings its vine at the object.
When it's hungry, it swings its razorsharp leaves, slicing up any unlucky object nearby for food.
Once ingested into this #mon's body, even the hardest object will melt into nothing.
As it floats along on the waves, it uses its toxic feelers to stab anything it touches.
When its 80 feelers absorb water, it stretches to become like a net to entangle its prey.
Proud of their sturdy bodies, they bash against each other in a contest to prove whose is harder.

Alolan.description: Its body is a magnetic stone. Iron sand attaches to the portions of its body that are the most magnetic.

default.description: It travels by rolling on mountain paths. If it gains too much speed, it stops by running into huge rocks.

Alolan.description: Its entire body is tinged with electricity due to the stones it likes to eat. It's very quicktempered.

default.description: Its rocklike body is so durable, even highpowered dynamite blasts fail to scratch its rugged hide.

Alolan.description: It fires rocks charged with electricity. Just grazing an opponent causes numbness and fainting.

default.description: Training by jumping over grass that grows longer every day has made it a worldclass jumper.

Galarian.description: It will look into your eyes and read the contents of your heart. If it finds evil there, it hides away.

default.description: It just loves to gallop. The faster it goes, the longer the swaying flames of its mane will become.

Galarian.description: A psychic attack unleashed from Rapidash's horn can punch a hole right through a thick metal sheet.

default.description: It is always so absentminded that it won't react, even if its flavorful tail is bitten.

Galarian.description: Although normally zoned out, its expression abruptly sharpens on occasion. This may be due to its diet.

default.description: An attached Shellder won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.

Galarian.description: A Shellder bite set off a chemical reaction with Slowbro's body, making Slowbro a Poisontype.

default.description: The electricity emitted by the units on each side of its body cause it to become a strong magnet.
When many Magneton gather together, the resulting magnetic storm disrupts radio waves.
In order to prevent their extinction, more people have made an effort to breed these #mon.

Galarian.description: These unique Farfetch'd are brave warriors, and they wield thick, tough leeks in battle.

default.description: In order to prevent their extinction, more people have made an effort to breed these #mon.
By alternately raising and lowering its two heads, it balances itself to be more stable while running.
An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads-even for a second-will get pecked severely.
The light blue fur that covers it keeps it protected against the cold. It loves icebergfilled oceans.
It sleeps under shallow ocean waters during the day, then looks for food at night when it's cold.
When two of these #mon's bodies are combined together, new poisons are created.

Alolan.description: A Grimer which had been brought in to solve a problem with garbage developed into this form.

default.description: As it moves, a very strong poison leaks from it, making the ground there barren for three years.

Alolan.description: Muk's coloration becomes increasingly vivid the more it feasts on its favorite dish-trash.

default.description: Clamping on to an opponent reveals its vulnerable parts, so it uses this move only as a last resort.
Even a missile can't break the spikes it uses to stab opponents. They're even harder than its shell.
It wraps its opponent in its gaslike body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.
It hides in the dark, planning to take the life of the next living thing that wanders close by.
Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
When it twitches its nose, it can tell where someone is sleeping and what that person is dreaming about.
The longer it swings its pendulum, the longer the effects of its hypnosis last.
If it is unable to find food, it will absorb nutrients by swallowing a mouthful of sand.
Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it's not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.
During the study of this #mon, it was discovered that its components are not found in nature.

Hisuian.description: When excited, it discharges the electric current stored in its belly, then lets out a laugh.

default.description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

Hisuian.description: The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in composition to an Apricorn.

default.description: If even one is separated from the group, the energy bond between the six will make them rejoin instantly.
Living in a good environment makes it grow lots of heads. A head that drops off becomes an Exeggcute.

Alolan.description: It swings its long neck like a whip and smacks its opponents. This makes Exeggutor itself dizzy, too.

default.description: It lost its mother after its birth. It wears its mother's skull, never revealing its true face.
Somewhere in the world is a cemetery just for Marowak. It gets its bones from those graves.

Alolan.description: It sets the bone it holds on fire and dances through through the night as a way to mourn its fallen allies.

default.description: It is also called the Kick Master. It uses its elastic legs to execute every known kick.
To increase the strength of all its punch moves, it spins its arms just before making contact.
Its tongue has welldeveloped nerves that run to the very tip, so it can be deftly manipulated.
If one gets close enough to it when it expels poisonous gas, the gas swirling inside it can be seen.
When it inhales poisonous gases from garbage, its body expands, and its insides smell much worse.

Galarian.description: It consumes particles that contaminate the air. Instead of leaving droppings, it expels clean air.

default.description: It can remember only one thing at a time. Once it starts rushing, it forgets why it started.
By lightly spinning its drilllike horn, it can easily shatter even a diamond in the rough.
People try to catch it for its extremely nutritious eggs, but it rarely can be found.
During battle, it constantly moves the vines that cover its body in order to annoy its opponent.
To avoid crushing the baby it carries in its pouch, it always sleeps standing up.
When they're in a safe location, they can be seen playfully tangling their tails together.
The male raises the young. If it is approached, it uses its toxic spikes to fend off the intruder.
During spawning season, they swim gracefully in the water, searching for their perfect mate.
When autumn comes, the males patrol the area around their nests in order to protect their offspring.
When the stars twinkle at night, it floats up from the sea floor, and its body's center core flickers.
It is said that it uses the sevencolored core of its body to send electric waves into outer space.
It uses the mysterious power it has in its fingers to solidify air into an invisible wall.

Galarian.description: It can radiate chilliness from the bottoms of its feet. It will tap dance all day on a frozen floor.

default.description: It uses the mysterious power it has in its fingers to solidify air into an invisible wall.
It's very proud of its speed. It moves so fast that its opponent does not even know what knocked it down.
It has several different cry patterns, each of which seems to have its own meaning.
When two Electabuzz touch, they control the electric currents to communicate their feelings.
It moves more frequently in hot areas. It can heal itself by dipping its wound into lava.
When the temperature drops at night, it sleeps on treetops or among roots where it is well hidden.
These violent #mon fight with other members of their herd in order to prove their strength.

Paldean.description: The “Combat Breed” fights in close quarters. It uses its short horns to strike the foe's weak spots.

default.description: This weak and pathetic #mon gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.
It appears whenever there is world conflict, burning down any place it travels through.

Red.description: Due to how rapidly it was forced to undergo evolution, this Gyarados retained its red Magikarp scales.

default.description: This gentle #mon loves to give people rides and provides a very comfortable way to get around.
When it encounters another Ditto, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.
Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.
As it uses the fins on the tip of its tail to swim, it blends with the water perfectly.
The negatively charged ions generated in its fur create a constant sparking noise.
Once it has stored up enough heat, this #mon's body temperature can reach up to 1700 degrees.
An artificial #mon created due to extensive research, it can perform only what is in its program.
In prehistoric times, it swam on the sea floor, eating plankton. Its fossils are sometimes found.
Its heavy shell allowed it to reach only nearby food. This could be the reason it is extinct.
Three hundred million years ago, it hid on the sea floor. It also has eyes on its back that glow.
It was able to swim quickly through the water by compactly folding up its razorsharp sickles.
In prehistoric times, this #mon flew freely and fearlessly through the skies.
This #mon's stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.
Legendary bird #mon. As it flies through the sky, it cools the air, causing snow to fall.

Galarian.description: Known as Articuno, this #mon fires beams that can immobilize opponents as if they had been frozen solid.

default.description: Legendary bird #mon. They say lightning caused by the flapping of its wings causes summer storms.

Galarian.description: When its feathers rub together, they produce a crackling sound like the zapping of electricity.

default.description: Legendary bird #mon. It is said to migrate from the south along with the spring.

Galarian.description: The sinister aura that blazes like molten fire around this #mon is what inspired the name Moltres.

default.description: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.
It is called the divine #mon. When its entire body brightens slightly, the weather changes.
It is said that somewhere in the ocean lies an island where these gather. Only they live there.
Said to rest quietly in an undiscovered cave, this #mon was created solely for battling.

Armored.description: With its defenses bolstered and its psychic attacks amplified by its armor, Mewtwo's power is unstoppable.

default.description: Because it can learn any move, some people began research to see if it is the ancestor of all #mon.
It loves to bask in the sunlight. It uses the leaf on its head to seek out warm places.
The scent that wafts from the leaves on its neck causes anyone who smells it to become energetic.
Anyone who stands beside it becomes refreshed, just as if they were relaxing in a sunny forest.
The fire that spouts from its back burns hottest when it is angry. The flaring flames intimidate foes.
Before battle, it turns its back on its opponent to demonstrate how ferociously its fire blazes.
When heat from its body causes the air around it to shimmer, this is a sign that it is ready to battle.

Hisuian.description: Said to purify lost, forsaken souls with its flames and guide them to the afterlife.

default.description: This rough critter chomps at any moving object it sees. Turning your back on it is not recommended.
The tips of its fangs are slanted backward. Once those fangs clamp down, the prey has no hope of escape.
Although it has a massive body, its powerful hind legs enable it to move quickly, even on the ground.
When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.
It lives in narrow burrows that fit its slim body. The deeper the nests go, the more mazelike they become.
It begins to hoot at the same time every day. Some trainers use them in place of clocks.
Its extremely soft feathers make no sound in flight. It silently sneaks up on prey without being detected.
It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.
In the daytime when it gets warm, it curls up inside a big leaf and drifts off into a deep slumber.
If prey becomes ensnared in its nest of spun string, it waits motionlessly until it becomes dark.
Rather than making a nest in one specific spot, it wanders in search of food after darkness falls.
As a result of its pursuit of faster, yet more silent flight, a new set of wings grew on its hind legs.
Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both positive and negative charges flowing through them.
This #mon uses the bright part of its body, which changed from a dorsal fin, to lure prey.
It is unskilled at storing electric power. Any kind of shock causes it to discharge energy spontaneously.
If the impact site of a meteorite is found, this #mon is certain to be within the immediate area.
Instead of walking with its short legs, it moves around by bouncing on its soft, tender body.
It is considered to be a symbol of good luck. Its shell is said to be filled with happiness.
Although it does not flap its wings very much, it can stay up in the air as it tags along after its trainer.
It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.
Once it begins to meditate at sunrise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.
It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.
Because of its rubbery, electricityresistant skin, it can store lots of electricity in its fur.
When it gets dark, the light from its bright, shiny tail can be seen from far away on the ocean's surface.
When these dance together, their petals rub against each other, making pretty, relaxing sounds.
The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry, even when it plays in the water.
The bubblelike pattern on its stomach helps it camouflage itself when it's in the water.
If a tree branch shakes when there is no wind, it's a Sudowoodo, not a tree. It hides from the rain.
When it expands its throat to croak out a tune, nearby Poliwag and Poliwhirl gather immediately.
It can be carried away on even the gentlest breeze. It may even float all the way to the next town.
As soon as it rains, it closes its flower and hides in the shade of a tree to avoid getting wet.
Even in the fiercest wind, it can control its fluff to make its way to any place in the world it wants.
It uses its tail to hang on to tree branches. It uses its momentum to swing from one branch to another.
It is very weak. Its only means of defense is to shake its leaves desperately at its attacker.
As the hot season approaches, the petals on this #mon's face become more vivid and lively.
It can see in all directions without moving its big eyes, helping it spot attackers and food right away.
A mucous membrane covers its body. Touching it barehanded will cause a shooting pain.

Paldean.description: They line up in groups of three or four and help each other as they walk across the dangerous wetlands.

default.description: Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head on the river bottom as it swims but seems not to care.
The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent's next move.
On the night of a full moon, or when it gets excited, the ring patterns on its body glow yellow.
It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location. Murkrow and Meowth loot one another's stashes.
Every time it yawns, Shellder injects more poison into it. The poison makes it more intelligent.

Galarian.description: A combination of toxins and the shock of evolving has caused Shellder to take control of Slowking.

default.description: It loves to watch people it's scared. It frightens them by screaming loudly or appearing suddenly.
Because different types of Unown exist, it is said that they must have a variety of abilities.
In order to conceal its black tail, it lives in a dark cave and only moves about at night.
When it is in danger, its tail uses some sort of mysterious powers to drive away the enemy.
It spits out a fluid that it uses to glue tree bark to its body. The fluid hardens when it touches air.
Usually found hanging on to a fat tree trunk. It shoots out bits of its shell when it sees action.
It hides deep inside caves where no light ever reaches it and remains virtually motionless there.
It builds its nest on a steep cliff. When it is done gliding, it hops along the ground back to its nest.
The many small metal particles that cover this #mon's body reflect bright light well.
In truth, it is a cowardly #mon. It growls eagerly in order to hide its fear from its opponent.
It can make most any #mon run away simply by opening its mouth wide to reveal its big fangs.
When faced with a larger opponent, it swallows as much water as it can to match the opponent's size.

Hisuian.description: Fishers detest it because it sprays poison from its spines, getting it everywhere.

default.description: This #mon's pincers, which contain steel, can crush any hard object it gets a hold of into bits.
The fluid secreted by its toes carves holes in rocks for nesting and can be mixed with Berries to make a drink.
With its Herculean powers, it can easily throw around an object that is 100 times its own weight.
This cunning #mon hides under the cover of darkness, waiting to attack its prey.

Hisuian.description: Its sturdy claws are ideal for traversing cliffs. These claws drip venom that infiltrates its prey.

default.description: It always licks honey. Its palm tastes sweet because of all the honey it has absorbed.
Although it has a large body, it is quite skilled at climbing trees. It eats and sleeps in the treetops.
These group together in areas that are hotter than normal. If it cools off, its skin hardens.
Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.
It uses the tip of its nose to dig for food. Its nose is so tough that even frozen ground poses no problem.
Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
The points on its head absorb nutrients from clean water. They cannot survive in polluted water.

Galarian.description: Sudden climate change wiped out this #mon. It absorbs others' lifeforce through its branches.

default.description: To escape from an attacker, it may shoot water out of its mouth, then use that force to swim backward.
Its instinct is to bury itself in holes. It often steals the nesting holes of others to sleep in them.
It always carries its food with it, wherever it goes. If attacked, it throws its food at the opponent.
It swims along freely, eating things that swim into its mouth. Its whole body is very coarse.
The feathers that it sheds are very sharp. It is said that people once used the feathers as swords.
Around dawn, its ominous howl echoes through the area to announce that this is its territory.
The pungentsmelling flame that shoots from its mouth results from toxins burning in its body.
It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life forms can survive.
During the deserted morning hours, it comes ashore where it deftly uses its trunk to take a shower.
Because this #mon's skin is so tough, a normal attack won't even leave a scratch on it.
This manmade #mon evolved from the latest technology. It may have unprogrammed reactions.
The round balls found on the fallen antlers can be ground into a powder that aids in sleeping.
The color of the mysterious fluid secreted from its tail is predetermined for each Smeargle.
To brush up on its fighting skills, it will challenge anyone. It has a very strong competitive spirit.
After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent's timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.
The sensitivity of its lips develops most quickly. It uses them to try to identify unknown objects.
It loves violent thunder. The space between its horns flickers bluishwhite when it is charging energy.
It naturally spits an 1100degree flame. It is said when many appear, it heralds a volcanic eruption.
In order to milk a Miltank, one must have a knack for rhythmically pulling up and down on its udders.
Biting into one of the delicious eggs that Blissey provides will make everyone around smile with joy.
This rough #mon stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity.
This brawny #mon courses around the earth, spouting flames hotter than a volcano's magma.
This divine #mon blows around the world, always in search of a pure reservoir.
Born deep underground, this #mon becomes a pupa after eating enough dirt to make a mountain.
It will not stay still, even while it's a pupa. It already has arms and legs under its solid shell.
In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to make the ground shake and mountains crumble.
It has an incredible ability to calm raging storms. It is said that Lugia appears when storms start.
It will reveal itself before a purehearted trainer by shining its bright rainbowcolored wings.
Revered as a guardian of the forest, Celebi appears wherever beautiful forests exist.
Its tail is filled with the nutrients necessary for growth. It plays by bouncing on its tail.
It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
Split in two, the tails are so adept at handling and doing things. Ambipom rarely uses its hands.
Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.
It prefers an arid atmposhere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture levels.
It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.
It carries a round, eggshaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.
People organize tours to see this #mon frolic and skim the tops of the waves with Remoraid.
It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.
It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.
The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness.
From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.
It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators do not trouble it.
It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.
There are still quite a few factories that rely on the flames provided by Magmortar to process metals.
It shares many blessings with people who respect one another's rights and avoid needless strife.
Its jaw power is incredible. It is adept at biting apart foes while flying by at high speed.
Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.
It causes small ice crystals to form by lowering the temperature of the surrounding atmosphere.
Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey… Then its fangs do the rest.
Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.
Its programming was modified to enable work in alien dimensions. It did not work as planned.
It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved trainer and walks with them.
After many battles it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.
Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You'll become stiff as stone if you touch it.
After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk.
It's highly skilled at tapdancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.
The fur shed from its beard retains heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.
A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone.
It can see in the dark with its left eye, and protects itself with mud that is as hard as iron.
It has virulent poison and daunting physical prowess. Preferring solitude, it does not form packs.
Its spikes and savage temperament have earned it the name Sea Fiend. It slurps poison to nourish itself.
It makes its nest with its hard tail by boring holes into deep bedrock. The nest can reach over six miles.
Now that the brain waves from its head and tail are synced up, its psychic power is 10 times stronger.
When attacked, it will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It's a risky move.
When its anger rose beyond a critical point, it gained power unfettered by its physical body.
The “Blaze Breed's” horns can reach over 1800 degrees. Those gored by them will suffer wounds and burns.
The “Aqua Breed” swims by jetting water from its horns. Its high body fat allows it to float easily.
